name: Built Villa - Impossible tower
description:
Built Villa is a tap on screen game where you have to built highest Villa of random materials. 

How high can you get ? 🗽

(Mobile devices supported 🤗) 

Controls : Just a tap!!!
Create materials from the moving crosshair.

(But facing too many bugs and glitches, 😔) 

Thanks to, Wishforge games, Victris games, Kenney, 4ian and pzUH assets and all youtubers and Gdevelop team❤️❤️❤️.

Music by,

Artist : Heston Mimms
Song : Monkey see monkey doo doo
Stream: https://open.spotify.com/track/5OFfm2...
Download: https://imuno.sourceaudio.com/#!detai...

Changes after updates:

  • Increase bounciness of materials for more difficulty
  • Background music changed
  • Glow and tint effect in start and restart button
  • Added particles emitter above the bar.
